00022 #include "dfsch/lib/process.h"
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <errno.h>
00025 
00026 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(spawn, NULL){
00027   char* cmd_line;
00028   int r;
00029   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, cmd_line);
00030   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00031   
00032   r = system(cmd_line);
00033 
00034   if (r == -1){
00035     dfsch_error("Cannot spawn process",
00036                 dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno)));
00037   }
00038   return DFSCH_MAKE_FIXNUM(r);
00039 }
00040 
00041 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(spawn_with_input_port, NULL){
00042   char* cmd_line;
00043   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, cmd_line);
00044   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00045   return dfsch_process_spawn_with_input_port(cmd_line);
00046 }
00047 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(spawn_with_output_port, NULL){
00048   char* cmd_line;
00049   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, cmd_line);
00050   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00051   return dfsch_process_spawn_with_output_port(cmd_line);
00052 }
00053 
00054 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(close_port, NULL){
00055   dfsch_object_t* port;
00056   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, port);
00057   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00058 
00059   return dfsch_process_close_port(port);
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_module_process_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00064   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "process:<port>", 
00065                     DFSCH_PROCESS_PORT_TYPE);
00066   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "process:<input-port>", 
00067                     DFSCH_PROCESS_INPUT_PORT_TYPE);
00068   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "process:<output-port>", 
00069                     DFSCH_PROCESS_OUTPUT_PORT_TYPE);
00070 
00071   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "process:spawn!",
00072                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(spawn));
00073   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "process:spawn-with-input-port!",
00074                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(spawn_with_input_port));
00075   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "process:spawn-with-output-port!",
00076                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(spawn_with_output_port));
00077   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "process:close-port!",
00078                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(close_port));
00079 }
